nodes.documentation:
@title KTYTokenVesting
@dev Extends TokenVesting contract to allow reclaim ether and contracts, if transfered to this by mistake.
nodes.name: KTYTokenVesting

@title KTYTokenVesting
@dev Extends TokenVesting contract to allow reclaim ether and contracts, if transfered to this by mistake.
nodes.name: KTYTokenVesting

nodes.documentation: @dev Call consturctor of TokenVesting with exactly same parameters

devdoc.details: Extends TokenVesting contract to allow reclaim ether and contracts, if transfered to this by mistake.

constructor.details: Call consturctor of TokenVesting with exactly same parameters

params.contractAddr: The address of the Ownable to be reclaimed.

reclaimEther().details: Transfer all Ether held by the contract to the owner.

releasableAmount(address).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested
ERC20 token which is being vested
ERC20 token which is being vested

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

vestedAmount(address).details: Calculates the amount that has already vested.

params.token: ERC20 token which is being vested

devdoc.title: KTYTokenVesting

revoke(address).notice: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.
